interface.name: nscd_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute NSCD in the nscd domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: nscd_exec
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to execute nscd in the caller domain.

interface.name: nscd_socket_use
interface.summary: Use NSCD services by connecting using a unix stream socket.

interface.name: nscd_shm_use
interface.summary: Use NSCD services by mapping the database from an inherited NSCD file descriptor.

interface.name: nscd_dontaudit_search_pid
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to search the NSCD pid directory.

interface.name: nscd_run
interface.summary: Execute nscd in the nscd domain, and allow the specified role the nscd domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the nscd domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the role's terminal.
